title: Weird Wednesday With SLaTerStream

embed.description: OCE | Welcome to SLaTerStream | Doing my Promo's | Platinum Here I Come!

body:
Come hang out with me today. It's a bit more relaxed than the usual ranked games.
Weird wednesdays are for trying out new things, sugest a champion or build for me and I'll give it a shot. Or jump in a normal game with me and show off your mad skills. 
Whatever your fancy check out the stream and if you like what you see give me a follow :)

replies.body: I guess that depends what you are into...
